section.title: p:os-cwd
section.para: The p:os-cwd step returns the current working directory.

note.title: Editorial Note
note.para: TBD: This is an almost direct port from EXProc. Details might still change.

section.para: The step returns a single c:result element containing the current working directory. On systems which have no concept of a working directory the resulting c:result element will be empty.
